alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 2:18PM CDT until August 25 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is ongoing and expected to continue with additional moderate to heavy rainfall this afternoon. * WHERE...A portion of southern Mississippi, including the following counties, Harrison and Jackson. * WHEN...Until 530 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ocean Springs, Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier, Vancleave, Hickory Hills, Wade, Big Point, Helena, Hurley, Gulf Park Estates and Latimer. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
